Dear Sudipa,

Hope my email finds you well!
Due to our company policy tickets that require testing from customer side needs to be closed with the possibility of reopening them in 30 days by a simple reply on the thread!
But we will make an exception in this case and we will leave this ticket open until Friday. Afterwards we are forced by the company rules to close the ticket, but as mentioned you can anytime reopen it in 30 days- very simple - by a reply on the thread.


Best regards,
